title: The womens sharpe revenge: or an answer to Sir Seldome Sober that writ those railing pamphelets called the Iuniper and Crabtree lectures, &c. Being a sound reply and a full confutation of those bookes: with an apology in this case for the defence of us women. Performed by Mary Tattle-well, and Ioane Hit-him-home, spinsters.
author: Tattle-well, Mary.
publicationStmtPublisher: By I. O[kes] and are to be sold by Ia. Becket at his shop in the inner Temple-gate,
